CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 4, 1956, page 2, reads: "'Goodbye Bud' - Fellow employes [sic] who worked with "Bud" for a number of years, tenderly carry the remains to the last resting place. They are, front row, left to right, Harry Martin, Thomas Forbes; second row, left to right, Horace Wright, William G. Nunn Sr., and third row, left to right, Frank Clark and Walter Pollard. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Six pallbearers, including front row left to right: Harry Martin, Thomas Forbes; second row: Horace Wright, William G. Nunn Sr.; and third row: Frank Clark, and Walter Pollard, carrying casket for "Bud" Waters, down stairs of Grace Memorial Presbyterian Church, Bryn Mawr Road, Schenley Heights
